msbt.message: Oh, I'm glad you're here! I nearly forgot. Thank you very much for delivering my present yesterday.What a fun toy that was! It took me back to when I was little, opening presents in the morning by the tree.
My gift from Santa was this cute little toy. Just what I was hoping for!It might have come from Santa, but I have you to thank for delivering it to me, .
Thank you so much for exchanging gifts with me yesterday!Sohow did you like the present I got you? I hope it didn't come off as too childish,
Thank you for the present you gave me yesterday, !It was a textbook Toy Day. Or was it a storybook Toy Day? Whichever it was, I had a great time!
You certainly had a busy Toy Day, didn't you, ?Helping Jingle deliver presents gift exchanges with your neighbors You were the star of the show!
Getting my gift from Santa AND a bonus present from you was quite the haul yesterday!I've been pinching myself to make sure it all really happened, and yep! I have two gifts and a sore cheek.
Did you have a nice Toy Day?I fell asleep in front of the fireplace hoping to catch a glimpse of Santa again. One of these years, I'll learn.

Did you get to eat any holiday cookies yesterday?I ended up eating the whole batch I made for Toy Day. Then I baked some more so I'd have a few for today!I know I'm supposed to leave some for Santa, but he's got a workshop. He can bake his own cookies.
